name: Robert A. EDWARDS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Edwards v. Commonwealth, Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Robert A. EDWARDS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of March, 2002, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Robert A. EDWARDS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 20, 2002.
